long_description: The high-capacity, ultralight Nathan Zelos 2L Hydration Vest sports an18 fl. oz. flask in the front pocket that provides extra fluid capacity for those thirsty for more water and longer adventures. 18 fl. oz. SpeedDraw Flask in right pocket. 2 front bottle pockets and 1 front zippered, smartphone-compatible pocket; stash pocket over the left front pocket fits several gels; pill pocket for electrolyte tabs. Rear external shockcord and gusseted stretch mesh rear pocket for increased capacity. 3-way Propulsion Harness(TM) stabilizes side-to-side and up-down movement of the bladder and other contents for a bounce-free ride. Wall mesh shoulder straps are highly breathable; perforated back panel for breathability and weight reduction. The Nathan Zelos 2L Hydration Vest features an internal stash pocket, key clip, full side adjustability and reflective trim.
short_description: The high-capacity, ultralight Nathan Zelos 2L Hydration Vest sports an18 fl. oz. flask in the front pocket that provides extra fluid capacity for those thirsty for more water and longer adventures.
